H0.text: what are the major languages spoken in greece. Turkish

H1.text: what are the major languages spoken in greece. Albanian

H2.text: what are the major languages spoken in greece. Macedonian

H3.text: what are the major languages spoken in greece. Greek Language

A4.text: Turkish is one of the most widely spoken minority languages in Greece today, with approximately 50,000 to 60,000 speakers.

A5.text: The official language of Greece is Greek, spoken by 99% of the population.

A6.text: Greek is the official language of Greece and Cyprus and one of the 24 official languages of the European Union.

A7.text: Greek is spoken today by at least 13.5 million people today in Greece, Cyprus, Italy, Albania, Turkey, and the many other countries of the Greek diaspora.
